headline: Baker Hughes, SOCAR partner to reduce flaring at Heydar Aliyev refinery in Baku
summary: The partnership aims to recover seven million normal cubic metres of methane annually and cut CO₂ emissions by up to 11,000 tonnes per annum (tpa).

headline: Here's Why Hold Strategy is Apt for Baker Hughes Stock
summary: BKR is experiencing robust growth in its new energy segment, underscoring its expanding footprint in energy transition technologies.
